pages.text: Guster are hostile creatures that can be found in the Desserts.$(br2)They uses Sand like short distance projectile and if a entity or you are too close to them, they will carry it and eject it, like a tornado.$(br2)On death the may drop Sand or a Gunter Eye. You can use this last one to craft a $(l:patchouli:redstone/alexsmobs/gustmaker)Gustmaker$(/l) or a $(l:patchouli:weapons/pocket_sand)Pocket of Sand$(/l.
Guster take damage when in contact with water.
